name: GTFO (itch) (Team Banana)
description:
An Adventurer has decided to make your dungeons loot their own, unlucky for them your dungeon is set up to deal with such a situation... unlucky for you, you are deemed expendable in such a scenario. Fuck that though, you're not paid enough for this shit. It's time to GTFO.

Created for the AbertayGDS Halloween 2022 Jam in 2.5 Days

Comment your personal best and challenge other players to beat it >:)

Controls :

- Left and right arrow keys to move

- Space to jump

- When against a wall moving into it and hitting space will allow you to wall jump to gain extra height

Known issues :
- Wall jumping not working on resolutions above 1080p (others things may cause it aswell?)
- Audio slider in main menu not syncing properly for resolutions other than 1080p
- volume slider visually resetting when respawning
- unclear controls
